title: ISic000628. Epitaph of Abdalas
body:
1D(is) M(anibus) s(acrum)
2Abdalas Domi-
3tiae Domitiani
4magister magnus
5ovium qui bene vix(it)
6in officio ann(os) LXXX

1D(IS)M(ANIBUS)S(ACRUM)
2ABDALASDOMI
3TIAEDOMITIANI
4MAGISTERMAGNUS
5OVIUMQUIBENEVIX(IT)
6INOFFICIOANN(OS)LXXX

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

English translation

Roger Wilson

Sacred to the spirits of the dead; Abdalas, (slave of) Domitia (wife of) Domitian, great master of the sheep, who lived well in his job; eighty years old

commentary
